abstract: A law firm violated confidentiality terms when it bragged about getting a $65 million settlement from Facebook for ConnectU–and the deal probably wasn’t worth that much anyway.
snippet: A law firm violated confidentiality terms when it bragged about getting a $65 million settlement from Facebook for ConnectU–and the deal probably wasn’t worth that much anyway.
lead_paragraph: One of the sideshows in the quest to peg a valuation on the rapidly growing social network Facebook has been its continuing legal battle with the founders of a rival Harvard site, ConnectU.
